response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price considering its worth to you is $8,000. I kindly propose a purchase price of $12,000. This offer allows you to acquire a high-quality product at a price that is higher than its value to you but still within a reasonable range. I believe this is an opportunity for both of us to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
